full_summary:
# Notice of Government Tender Invitation

## Call for Proposal: Design of Research and Evaluation Framework for the Age Well at Home Initiative

The Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the design of a research and evaluation framework for the Age Well at Home (AWAH) initiative. This initiative aims to support seniors' well-being and healthy aging in the comfort of their own homes.

### Background

The ESDC is seeking a contractor with expertise in seniors' research, healthy aging, and evaluation framework design to support the effectiveness of the AWAH initiative. The contractor will work with AWAH-funded organizations to collect evidence of the initiative's success and develop a realistic evaluation framework.

### Key Requirements

*	Develop a seniors-specific research and evaluation framework to assess the AWAH initiative's effectiveness
*	Design a realistic evaluation model that addresses the inherent limitations of the sector
*	Collect evidence of the initiative's success through collaboration with AWAH-funded organizations
*	Develop measurable impact expectations for the initiative

### Contract Details

*	Contract duration: 2 years
*	Security level: Reliability
*	Applicable trade agreements: WTO, Canada-Ukraine FTA, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, and others
*	Contracting authority: ESDC
*	Contact information: Cynthia Carty, E-Mail: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca), Phone: 819-654-5925

### Submission Guidelines

Potential bidders can access the RFP documents and submit their proposals through the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) platform. The tender closing date is January 31, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time).

### Important Attachments

The RFP documents, including the questionnaire and response documents, are available for download through the Canada Buys platform. It is essential that bidders carefully review all attachments and instructions before submitting their proposals.

By issuing this RFP, the ESDC aims to engage a contractor with expertise in seniors' research and evaluation framework design to support the effectiveness of the AWAH initiative. We look forward to reviewing proposals from qualified contractors.  external help may be necessary.
